name: Tower
short_description: Almost every wall in this room is full of shelves with books and various trinkets. A cramped bed and small desk are pushed against opposing walls.
long_description: The tower interior could almost be mistaken for a library if not for the bed crammed against one wall. Almost every other wall is filled with bookshelves with many kinds of books and trinkets with no discernible organizational system. The only other free wall has a single window with a small desk, the surface covered with quills and various pieces of paper.

spiral staircase.description: Made of stone bricks, the middle of the staircase is covered in a luxurious-feeling carpet runner that spirals down into the distance. It seems to lead to the bottom of the tower.

diary.description: A vaguely familiar-looking diary is open to a scrawled page. You have an overwhelming urge to read the entire thing - but do you dare to take it?

small window.description: From this vantage point, you can see the entire rest of the castle, including the courtyard you awoke in. It all seems so far away now.
